Plot: In this offshoot of the 1950s "claymation" cartoon series, the crazy Blockheads threaten to ruin Gumby's benefit concert by replacing the entire city of Clokeytown with robots.
Title: Gumby: The Movie
Writer: Art Clokey, Gloria Clokey, Art Clokey (script)
Actors: Dal McKennon, Art Clokey, Gloria Clokey, Manny La Carruba
